title: For the preachers and leaders of the people called Quakers ... the Lord, whose ambassador I am, both sent me hither at this time; and His message to you is this : that your long prayers, as well as your long preachinge, are an abomination unto Him / John Pennyman.
author: Pennyman, John, 1628-1706.
publisher: Printed in the year 1673 and now reprinted ...,
